name: TACHeadlines
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Apple Center or TAC is an independent news publication and has not been authorized, sponsored, or otherwise approved by Apple Inc.

Follow the latest news from Apple including, updates, new products, and even new rumors! Once you have enabled this skill, updates from The Apple Center will become a part of your Flash Briefing or news updates when you request them.

In your Alexa app, go to Settings and find your Flash Briefing to move The Apple Center to the top of your news brief!
